an10.178:4.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you what is good and what is not good.
an10.178:4.2: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
an10.178:5.2: Killing living creatures, stealing, and sexual misconduct; speech that’s lying, divisive, harsh, or meaningless; covetousness, ill will, and wrong view.
an10.178:5.3: This is called what is not good.
an10.178:6.2: Avoiding killing living creatures, stealing, and sexual misconduct; avoiding speech that’s lying, divisive, harsh, or meaningless; contentment, good will, and right view.
an10.178:6.3: This is called what is good.”
